text: Kenneth Charles Cope (14 April 1931 - 11 September 2024) was an English actor. He was best known for his roles as Marty Hopkirk in Randall and Hopkirk (Deceased), Jed Stone in Coronation Street and Ray Hilton in Brookside. Cope was born in Liverpool, England. Cope was diagnosed with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease in 2013.Corrie actor Kenneth Cope was told he was dying . Unreality TV. Retrieved 15 January 2012 He died on 11 September 2024 from problems caused by the disease in Southport, England at the age of 93.https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2024/09/12/carry-on-star-kenneth-cope- dies/?msockid=2b759115ebe667a42f7d85edeacf66c1https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/southport- itv-british-vic-reeves-bob-mortimer-b2611707.html ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2024 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Liverpool Category:Deaths from COPD
title: Kenneth Cope
